Developer Documentation

If you're the kind of person who loves to hack on the nitty gritty, you can start by looking at the bin/withlist script. With this script you can directly examine and manipulate list object attributes.

Coming soon, all the rest of the gory details...

SourceForge project

Developers should start with the Mailman project at SourceForge.

Mailman Wiki

You should also take a look at the Mailman Design Notes Wiki page. This is where Mailman's future course will be plotted in plain sight. Because Wikis are intended to be collaborative, you're free to contribute to this page in true Wiki fashion.
